greetings: Welcome on my digital resume, where you'll learn more about myself and what I do.
name: Test

introduction.title: About Myself
introduction.text:
I’ve always been highly curious of the world around me. The acquisition of new knowledge is a great motivation to/for ? me, I’m always keen to learn new stuff. Be ready for the questions.
I’m a science lover and a geek keen on IT, video game, science fiction, music …

After high school I started to learn chemistry. As it turns out life led me back to computers with the my two-years degree in electrical ingeneering and computer science. I had a great time learning programming and animating robots and other electronic stuff.

Finally I developped an android application as part of an internship. I wanted to experience all the possibilities that programming languages offers. I ended up learning web development.

Since then I moved in London to work in this great city.

categories.title: Front-End
categories.description: I love how programmation allow us to give life to our ideas and allow users enjoy them. I place great emphasis on intuive and clean experiences

categories.title: Tools
categories.description: Using the right tools is the most important thing while coding. Some save you time, some simplify your work ... If something is bothering you there is a tool to help you.
